title: ASUS PB278Q Monitor Review
metaDescription: Do you find yourself spending many hours, possibly even over eight hours, a day looking at a computer screen? Maybe this is for your job, like software development or graphic design, and therefore is unfortunately unavoidable. If you are looking for an excellent computer monitor to reduce eyestrain and improve focus read on to see my review for the ASUS PB278Q 27" Eye Care Monitor
